chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 12 mini is having the following problem:
Hello, I have a problem with my package that says it's delivered but I haven't received it. Once I got an email telling me it was at the Leclerc drive, I went there and they didn't find anything. Then I got another email saying it was a Colissimo that would arrive. So I'll just wait until tomorrow. This is the first time I've had so many problems receiving a phone from you.
Thank you for your help,

Hello,

My iPhone 12 mini is having the following issue:

I didn't receive my phone, although it's marked as delivered, I'm desperately looking for it. Here are the messages I received.

Thank you for your help,

Hi there,

The recipient of this order claims they haven't received it, even though the tracking shows up as delivered. 

Please send us a Proof of Delivery (POD) with the customer's signature, a photo of the package being handed to the customer, or a screenshot showing the GPS location of the delivery, within 2 business days. 

Please note: any other POD will not be considered relevant (ie: unsigned document or unclear photo).

Thanks for your help.

Looking forward to hearing from you,
Rosario, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Can you ask the customer to check with their neighbours or family members whether they receive package. If the customer is still unable to find the parcel, please send us the handwritten CND as well as the customer's ID. We have informed our logistics partner regarding this issue. Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Hello

The parcel is on its way back to our warehouse.

Thank you

Valérie DECAMPS

Dear Backcare,

We have received the parcel at our warehouse.  May we know if the customer would like a refund or a reshipent?

Regards,
JH

Good morning,

I contact you because the customer wants to have the return of his article.

He has already sent us the necessary documents regarding that.

I shared these documents with you.

Thank you.

Sincerely,

Nazira Customer Service Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the request for a reshipment. We will provide the tracking number soon.

Regards,
JY

Hi ecomobile,

We kindly ask you to do the necessary in the next 24 hours.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Aina Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Here is the TN: 10694000336590

Regards,
RK
